about_the_game:
This time you will get to discover many murder stories, meet many people – good, bad, just minding their own business, meet new friends and change the story by making your own choices! There are many exciting adventures waiting for you in each part of our new game series! Death, love, hate, mysteries - you have to deal with all of this, solving numerous puzzles along the way and searching for items, playing your favorite hidden object scenes! Gather your wits for an unforgettable detective story in this pulse-pounded new Hidden-Object Puzzle Adventure!

This Collector's Edition includes:

Make choices and change and choose your end of the story!
Play and re-play your favorite puzzles and mini-games to earn a variety of achievements!
Enjoy bonus materials!
Keep an eye out for different collectibles!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0

  • Processor: 2.0 GHz

  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space

short_description: Solve a series of tough cases, full of personal drama! In the new game series, you have to unravel some of the hardest mysteries using both logic and your intuition!
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Russian
*languages with full audio support
